name: arrow-caret
description: This icon signifies an expandable item, or to be used for next/previous affordances.

name: arrow-change
description: This icon signifies an action to refresh or sync information.

name: arrow-rotate
description: This icon signifies an action to rotate an image.

name: arrow
description: This icon signifies that the user will be taken somewhere when clicked. It is mostly to be used as a back button.

name: content-add
description: This icon signifies an action to upload media or input new data. Also, Zooming in.

name: content-attach
description: This icon signifies an action to attach. It is not to be used to indicate that content is attached (use content-attached).

name: content-attached
description: This icon signifies that content is attached.

name: content-bullet
description: This icon signifies a neutral validation state. For an unordered list, a standard text bullet should be used.

name: content-check
description: This icon signifies that something has been done successfully.

name: content-compose
description: This icon signifies an action to create a new (often longform) written object, such as a Story in Memories.

name: content-copy
description: This icon signifies an action to duplicate an object or copy to clipboard.

name: content-delete
description: This icon signifies an action to delete, not to merely detach (use content-detach), hide (use control-hide), nor remove (use content-remove).

name: content-detach
description: This icon signifies an action to detach content. It does not indicate that content is no longer attached.

name: content-edit
description: This icon signifies an action to start editing something. It does not indicate that something has been edited (use content-history).

name: content-flag
description: This icon signifies an action to report something to Support.

name: content-history
description: This icon signifies that a change has taken place.

name: content-link
description: Adding a URL/hyperlink.

name: content-lock
description: This icon signifies an object is uneditable.

name: content-print
description: This icon signifies an action to print.

name: content-remove
description: This icon signifies an action to exclude something. It does not indicate that data will be purged from the system (use content-delete). And it is used for Zoom out.

name: content-tag
description: This icon signifies an action to add a new tag to a Memory.

name: content-undo
description: This icon signifies an action to undo. It does not indicate an action to rotate (use arrow-rotate).

name: content-unlink
description: Removing a URL/hyperlink.

name: content-unlock
description: This icon signifies an action to make an object editable.

name: control-bottom-sheet
description: Toggles a side sheet to a bottom sheet.

name: control-brightness-less
description: This icon signifies an action to decrease the brightness of an image. It does not indicate toggling the daybreak theme.

name: control-brightness-more
description: This icon signifies an action to increase the brightness of an image. It does not indicate toggling the daybreak theme.

name: control-contrast-less
description: This icon signifies an action to decrease the contrast of an image. It does not indicate toggling the daybreak theme.

name: control-contrast-more
description: This icon signifies an action to increase the contrast of an image. It does not indicate toggling the daybreak theme.

name: control-exposure
description: This icon signifies an action to adjust the exposure of an image. It does not indicate toggling the daybreak/nightfall theme.

name: control-grid
description: This icon signifies a state or action to view a set of images or objects in a grid layout.

name: control-hide
description: This icon signifies an action to hide something that is currently in view.

name: control-highlight
description: This icon signifies an action to add a highlight to an image.

name: control-invert
description: This icon signifies an action to invert the colors of an image. It does not indicate toggling the daybreak/nightfall theme.

name: control-list
description: This icon signifies a state or action to view a set of images or objects in a listed layout. It does not signify a menu (use menu).

name: control-settings-adjust
description: This icon signifies a menu of tools to manipulate an image in the Image Viewer.

name: control-side-sheet
description: Toggles a bottom sheet to a side sheet.

name: control-split
description: This icon signifies an action to switch the current view into a two-up, split-screen layout.

name: control-target
description: This icon signifies re-centering the user's view back to the default position.

name: control-view
description: This icon signifies an action to show something that is currently hidden.

name: discovery-heritage
description: This icon signifies the "Where Am I From" product.

name: discovery-name-meaning
description: This icon signifies the "Name Meaning" feature in the "All About Me" product.

name: discovery-name-popularity
description: This icon signifies the "Name Popularity" feature in the "All About Me" product.

name: discovery-population
description: This icon signifies the "Population Quiz" feature in the "All About Me" product.

name: document-basic
description: This icon signifies a record.

name: document-book
description: This icon signifies the Memory type "Documents"

name: document-box
description: This icon signifies the "Source Box" product.

name: document-folder-love
description: This icon signifies the "Liked Memories" collection in the Memories Gallery.

name: document-folder-open
description: This icon signifies the album currently being viewed in the Memories Gallery.

name: document-folder
description: This icon signifies an album in Memories.

name: document-pdf
description: This icon signifies a PDF file format.

name: document-photo
description: This icon signifies the Memory type "Photos"

name: document-record-person
description: This icon signifies a persona from a record.

name: document-story
description: This icon signifies the Memory type "Stories"

name: help-announcement
description: This icon signifies the "FamilySearch Blog" product.

name: help-preserver
description: This icon signifies the "Help Others" product.

name: help-test-drive
description: This icon signifies the "Guided Tour" feature from Indexing. .

name: help-tip
description: This icon signifies the "Getting Started" product.

name: logo-facebook
description: This icon signifies an action to share something from FamilySearch to Facebook. It is not to be used as a link to FamilySearch's Facebook page.

name: logo-fb-messenger
description: This icon signifies an action to share something from FamilySearch to Facebook Messenger.

name: logo-google
description: This icon signifies an action to share something from FamilySearch to Google+.

name: logo-pinterest
description: This icon signifies an action to share something from FamilySearch to Pinterest.

name: logo-twitter
description: This icon signifies an action to share something from FamilySearch to Twitter. It is not to be used as a link to FamilySearch's Twitter profile.

name: logo-whatsapp
description: This icon signifies an action to share something from FamilySearch to WhatsApp.

name: media-camera
description: This icon signifies an action to take a photo with the device's camera. It does not signify "Photos" in Memories (use document-photo).

name: media-film
description: This icon signifies that a record is available on microfilm.

name: media-headphones
description: This icon signifies the Memory type "Audio"

name: media-microphone-off
description: This icon signifies an action to mute the device's microphone.

name: media-microphone
description: This icon signifies an action to enable the device's microphone or that the device's microphone is currently active/unmuted. It does not signify "Audio" in Memories (use media-headphones).

name: media-volume
description: This icon signifies an action to adjust the volume or mute the device's speaker. It does not signify "Audio" in Memories (use media-headphones).

name: menu-close
description: This is for closing an overlay or menu. It is not for deleting (use content-delete).

name: menu-home
description: This icon signifies the home screen of an app.

name: menu-more
description: This icon signifies an overflow menu of actions.

name: menu-new-window
description: This icon signifies an action to follow a link to a new tab.

name: menu-search
description: This icon signifies a way to search a database.

name: menu
description: This icon signifies access to the top-level navigation of the app. It is not to be used elsewhere. This is not a drag-and-drop "grip"

name: notice-important
description: This icon signifies a error validation state.

name: notice-mute
description: This icon signifies a state or action to mute notifications.

name: notice-question
description: This opens the Help Overlay.

name: notice-suggestion
description: This icon signifies the "Research Suggestions" feature in the Family Tree.

name: notice-warning
description: This icon signifies a warning validation state.

name: notice
description: This icon signifies the "Notifications" product.

name: person-duplicates
description: This icon signifies the "Possible Duplicates" feature in the Family Tree.

name: person
description: This icon generally signifies "user" or "a person in the Family Tree". When mentioning a specific user or a specific person in the Family Tree, use Avatars.

name: social-face-content
description: This icon signifies a happy reaction. It does not signify a user or a person in the Family Tree (use person).

name: social-send
description: This icon signifies an action to send a message.

name: social-share
description: This icon signifies a menu of sharing options.

name: thing-calendar
description: This icon signifies a standardized date.

name: thing-flag
description: President of a country.

name: thing-map-pin
description: This icon signifies a standardized place.

name: thing-movie
description: This icon signifies the "Best Film" feature in the "All About Me" product. It does not signify a video.

name: tree-descendancy
description: This icon signifies the "Descendancy" view of the Family Tree.

name: tree-fan
description: This icon signifies the "Fan Chart" view of the Family Tree.

name: tree-pedigree
description: This icon signifies the "Landscape" (horizantal icon orientation) and "Portrait" (vertical icon orientation) views of the Family Tree.

name: tree-view-relationship
description: This icon signifies an action to view the user's relationship to another person.
